Bishab Pokharel

MSc. Intelligent Adaptive Systems, Universität Hamburg, Germany.

I am a graduate student of the program Intelligent Adaptive Systems (MSc.) at Universität Hamburg, Germany. My research interest is towards LLM training, fine-tuning, deployment, and cross-model evaluation, with knowledge in modern-day LLMs and LLMOps.

I have 3 years of experience in generative AI for texts (GPT, Llama, Mistral) and vision (GANs, GPT-4o, DALL-E), fulfillment-based chatbots (RASA, Google DialogFlow), Deep Learning and CV (CNNs, YOLO), Software Systems (Python Django, FastAPI, Flask), DevOps (Docker, k8s), and Cloud Services and System Architecture (Terraform for IaaS, Microsoft Azure, GCP, Amazon AWS).

I am working as a Data and Analytics Werkstudent at Crossnative where I develop and deploy client-specific LLM pipelines for business and finance. Previously I worked as a Werkstudent for ML Development at Adalab, and Machine Learning Engineer Intern at Robofied and Technocolabs.

You can find more about my experience and academic background on my CV.

News

Jan 1, 2024 Started the position Werkstudent for Data Analytics at Crossnative GmbH, Hamburg, Germany. Currently focused on LLMOps, including tasks related to LLM training, fine-tuning, deployment, and cross-model evaluation.
Feb 1, 2023 Started the position Werkstudent for ML Development and Infrastructure at Adalab UG, Hamburg, Germany.
Nov 1, 2022 Research work on the title An Interactive AI-Powered Web-Healthcare System was accepted at the Second International Conference on Computer Science, Engineering and Applications, 2022 at GIET University, India. This paper is IEEE Xplore indexed.
Oct 1, 2022 Started Masters in Intelligent Adaptive Systems at Universität Hamburg, Germany.
Jul 31, 2022 Completed Bachelors in Computer Engineering with Data Science as Engineering Minor.

Publications

  1. IEEE
    An Interactive AI-Powered Web Healthcare System
    Bishab Pokharel, Ganesh KC, Bigyan Timilsina, Mahesh Makkam, and Veerpal Kaur
    2022 Second International Conference on Computer Science, Engineering and Applications (ICCSEA) 2022
    Abs PDF Code

    This paper elucidates the development of an AI-infused healthcare service package, drawing on insights from the Covid-19 pandemic, to advance healthcare solutions while remaining responsive to dynamic user requirements in the field of healthcare.
